ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest]
ygData.msgSnippet: hi im a lvl 41 shaman of the tribunal circle on the povar server just curious if anyone else is on it ...
ygData.messageBody:
hi im a lvl 41 shaman of the tribunal circle on the povar server just
curious if anyone else is on it







>From: "Nygaard, Jeff" <jeff.nygaard@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest]
>Date: Tue, 10 Dec 2002 13:04:15 -0800
>
>I have been playing on the Tunare serve since the day it went live. I
>started off playing a dwarf cleric and got him to level 50 before RoK came
>out. While waiting for expansions to come out I started a gnome warrior and
>never really looked back on my cleric. My cleric is still level 54 and only
>played in the bazaar as my trader. My warrior is level 64 now and I really
>do not see myself playing any other class full time. Most days I can be
>found playing my warrior and picking another class of my families to 2 box.
>Usually a 61 druid, 64 monk or a 61 enchanter depending on what is needed
>and where I am heading.
>
>Sistily - Gnome Warrior
>Tunare Server
>
>Jeff Nygaard - ASC Buyer / Planner
>Goodrich Aerostructures Group
>Alabama Service Center
>Voice 251 952 3191
>Fax 251 952 3338
>jeff.Nygaard@...
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jerry O'Connor [mailto:dsnywrldlvr@...]
>Sent: Monday, December 09, 2002 6:46 PM
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest]
>
>I play on Tribunal main is 49 paladin Freelight, others I play are Greyvin
>40 druid, Rashir 23 beastlord, 20 Bard soulsingr 17 shaman Dungheep
> Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@...> wrote:
>I used to play on Tholuxe Paells, but I started over on the new Venril
>Sathir server. It's fun being a true newbie again. My main is a dark elf
>cleric, just level 14.
> David Molenberghs <david@...> wrote:
>Antonius Bayle here
>Helil
>Barbarian Shaman 49
>
>What servers and chars do you all have?
>
>-----Oorspronkelijk bericht-----
>Van: Rob LeBeau [mailto:rlebeau65@...]
>Verzonden: zondag 8 december 2002 15:27
>Aan: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Onderwerp: Re: [EverQuest]
>Ahhh nope I think your right.
>i myself play on Druzzil Ro.
>
>Good Luck and Happy hunting
>
>
>
